io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.controller

Interface PortfolioPersistService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioPersistServiceImpl

    public interface PortfolioPersistService
    An interface for a persistence service layer for stock portfolios. Implementations of this interface should call on the appropriate DAO implementation to handle the actual persisting of the object, and add code for transaction handling and additional operations on top of the CRUD operations that the DAO handles.
    Version:
    2.4
    Author:
    craig

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createNewPortfolio

        PortfolioModel createNewPortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                                  java.math.BigDecimal startingCashBalance)
        Create a new portfolio with the specified portfolio name and starting cash balance.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name of the new portfolio.
        startingCashBalance - the starting cash balance of the new portfolio.
        Returns:
        the newly created portfolio.

      • getSavedPortfolioNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSavedPortfolioNames()
        Get a list of the names of all saved portfolios.
        Returns:
        a list of the names of all saved portfolios.

      • getPortfolio

        PortfolioModel getPortfolio(java.lang.String fileName)
        Get a portfolio with the corresponding file name. The filename must be a perfect match for one of the names returned by the getSavedPortfolioNames() method.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the filename of the portfolio.
        Returns:
        the portfolio that matches the filename.

      • getPortfolio

        PortfolioModel getPortfolio(int userid)
        Get a portfolio with the specified userid.
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the portfolio.
        Returns:
        the portfolio with the specified userid.

      • savePortfolio

        void savePortfolio(PortfolioModel portfolioModel)
        Save a portfolio to the database.
        Parameters:
        portfolioModel - the portfolio to save.
